mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,REVIEW_TITLE ,REVIEW_WRITER ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE ,ORIGIN_NAME FROM REVIEW WHERE STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO ,REVIEW_TITLE ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,REVIEW_WRITER ,CREATE_DATE ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO replyNo ,REPLY_CONTENT replyContent ,REPLY_WRITER replyWriter ,CREATE_DATE createDate FROM REPLY WHERE REF_RNO = #{reviewNo} AND STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_REPLY(review_reply_key ,USER_KEY , CONTENT , TOILET_NO , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME , DEL_YN) VALUES (REVIEW_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{memberNo} , #{content} ,#{toiletNo} , (SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) ,(SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) ,'N')
mapper.select: SELECT rr.USER_KEY as userKey, m.MEMBER_NICK as userNickName , rr.REVIEW_REPLY_KEY as reviewReplyKey, rr.content as CONTENT, rr.CREATE_TIME as createTime, rr.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, rr.DEL_YN as delYn, rr.TOILET_NO as toiletNo FROM REVIEW_REPLY rr JOIN member m ON m.member_no = rr.USER_KEY WHERE rr.TOILET_NO = #{toiletNo} AND rr.DEL_YN = 'N' order by rr.review_reply_key asc
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW_SCRAP (SCRAP_NO ,MEMBER_NO , TOILET_NO) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SCRAP_NO), 0) + 1 FROM REVIEW_SCRAP),#{memberNo},#{toiletNo})
mapper.delete: delete from REVIEW_SCRAP where TOILET_NO = #{toiletNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from REVIEW_SCRAP where TOILET_NO = #{toiletNO}
select count(*) from REVIEW_SCRAP where TOILET_NO = #{toiletNo} and MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO REVIEW_STAR s USING DUAL on (s.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND s.TOILET_NO = #{toiletNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET s.STAR = #{starCnt} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (s.MEMBER_NO, s.STAR, s.TOILET_NO) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{starCnt}, #{toiletNo})
mapper.select: SELECT rr.USER_KEY, rr.REVIEW_REPLY_KEY, rr.CONTENT, rr.CREATE_TIME, rr.UPDATE_TIME, rr.DEL_YN, rr.TOILET_NO, t.TOILET_NAME FROM REVIEW_REPLY rr JOIN TOILET t ON rr.TOILET_NO = t.TOILET_NO WHERE rr.USER_KEY = #{userKey}
